code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var appSlice=createSlice({name:"app",initialState:{user:null,selectedImage:null},reducers:{login:function login(state,action){state.user=action.payload;},logout:function logout(state){state.user=null;},selectImage:function selectImage(state,action){state.selectedImage=action.payload;},resetImage:function resetImage(state){state.selectedImage=null;}}});var _appSlice$actions=appSlice.actions,login=_appSlice$actions.login,logout=_appSlice$actions.logout,selectImage=_appSlice$actions.selectImage,resetImage=_appSlice$actions.resetImage;export{login,logout,selectImage,resetImage};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.app.user;};export var selectSelectedImage=function selectSelectedImage(state){return state.app.selectedImage;};export default appSlice.reducer;
